item.title: Linux Setup
item.description: Utilities Input Methods Framwork: Fcitx Chinese: Sougou Pinyin Japanese: Mozc LaTeX Select from: texlive-base - 136 MB texlive-latex-recommended - 177 MB texlive - 240 MB texlive-latex-extra - 404 MB texlive-full - 4714 MB References https://linuxconfig.org/how-to-install-latex-on-ubuntu-18-04-bionic-beaver-linux

item.title: Vim
item.description: B = Life Technologies C = Minotech Biotechnology E = Agilent Technologies I = SibEnzyme Ltd. J = Nippon Gene Co., Ltd. K = Takara Bio Inc. M = Roche Applied Science N = New England Biolabs O = Toyobo Biochemicals Q = Molecular Biology Resources - CHIMERx R = Promega Corporation S = Sigma Chemical Corporation V = Vivantis Technologies X = EURx Ltd. Y = SinaClon BioScience Co.

item.title: 摘抄
item.description: 鲁迅 狂人日记 某君昆仲，今隐其名，皆余昔日在中学时良友；分隔多年，消息渐阙。日前偶闻其一大病；适归故乡，迂道往访，则仅晤一人，言病者其弟也。劳
